biblinkcreator

Class Schema

  • java.lang.Object
    • biblinkcreator.Schema

  • public class Schema
extends java.lang.Object
    A class for the structure (vocabulary) of the saved data or links.

    Author: David Nazarian

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Schema(java.lang.String namespace) 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      java.lang.String getDataGraphURIString(java.lang.String repositoryName)
      Gets the URI string of the named graph containing the extracted, processed and saved data of a repository.
      java.lang.String getGraphPath() 
      java.lang.String getLinksGraphURIString(java.lang.String repositoryAName)
      Gets a string that can be used to filter the link triples from a named graph by specifying the link source repository name (alias).
      java.lang.String getLinksGraphURIString(java.lang.String repositoryAName, java.lang.String repositoryBName)
      Gets a string that can be used to filter the link triples from a named graph by specifying the link source and link destination repository names (aliases).
      java.lang.String getLinksGraphURIString(java.lang.String repositoryAName, java.lang.String repositoryBName, Identifier.IdentifierType identifierType)
      Gets a string that can be used to filter the link triples from a named graph by specifying the link source, the link destination repository names (aliases) and the identifier used to create the links.

      java.lang.String getPropertyPath() 
      java.lang.String getTitlePath()

      • getDataGraphURIString

        public java.lang.String getDataGraphURIString(java.lang.String repositoryName)
        Gets the URI string of the named graph containing the extracted, processed and saved data of a repository.
        Parameters:

      • getLinksGraphURIString

        public java.lang.String getLinksGraphURIString(java.lang.String repositoryAName)
        Gets a string that can be used to filter the link triples from a named graph by specifying the link source repository name (alias).
        Parameters:
        repositoryAName - The name (alias) of the link source repository.
        Returns:
        The string that can be used to filter the link triples.

      • getLinksGraphURIString

        public java.lang.String getLinksGraphURIString(java.lang.String repositoryAName,
                                               java.lang.String repositoryBName)
        Gets a string that can be used to filter the link triples from a named graph by specifying the link source and link destination repository names (aliases).
        Parameters:
        repositoryAName - The name (alias) of the link source repository.
        repositoryBName - The name (alias) of the link destination repository.
        Returns:
        The string that can be used to filter the link triples.

      • getLinksGraphURIString

        public java.lang.String getLinksGraphURIString(java.lang.String repositoryAName,
                                               java.lang.String repositoryBName,
                                               Identifier.IdentifierType identifierType)
        Gets a string that can be used to filter the link triples from a named graph by specifying the link source, the link destination repository names (aliases) and the identifier used to create the links.
        Parameters:
        repositoryAName - The name (alias) of the link source repository.
        repositoryBName - The name (alias) of the link destination repository.
        identifierType - The identifier used to create the links.
        Returns:
        The string that can be used to filter the link triples.
